instructor/pedagogy.title: Pedagogical Guide
instructor/pedagogy.description: Science Around the Board is an active learning platform designed to replace or supplement traditional review sessions. Unlike a passive lecture or a low-stakes multiple-choice quiz, this engine uses game theory to drive engagement and metacognition to measure confidence.

instructor/technical-guide.title: Technical Manual
instructor/technical-guide.description: This guide explains how to build a fully functional "Cartridge" (TSV file) for the Science Around the Board engine.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Science Around the Board is an open-source, customizable board game engine designed to gamify higher education.

student-guide.title: Student Guide
student-guide.description: Welcome to Science Around the Board. This is a competitive strategy game where your knowledge of the course material directly translates to in-game success.
